name: ACCUMULUS II
description: These works explore the multitude of data points collected from us in our day to day lives and our cloud based personas that are then created in the digital space. The images are created from video footage of human movement, tracked and reimposed to capture all of the physical positions of the subject during a one second movement — these layered compositions are then volume displaced to generate a further physical dimension based on the speed and tone of each pixel. The resulting images form human clouds, digitally crafted from tracked movement data.
